html:
1.6.18  4:22 pm   You have said many times that you write melody and lyrics at the same time. Where do chords and accompaniment fit into this?

     the essentials of the chords are a package deal with the melody/lyric. occasionally there will be brief hints and/or descriptions of the feel/arrangement details. the tempo should be firmly established. all other details would be hashed out when it's time to actually make the thing

1.6.18  3:09 pm   What is history

     what happened (before)

1.6.18  2:58 pm   is weird good?

     you get to decide

1.6.18  2:41 pm   Can you tell me the bpm of the new song (I'm grasping here, bill. I'm getting restless!)

     104

1.6.18  1:34 pm   How do I tell someone I like them

     you could just tell them, but it might be a very strong thing to say to someone depending on how well you know each other so far. if you don't know them that well, you might get some unexpected and/or strange results

1.6.18  1:12 pm   Do you believe in magic?

     everything is magic

1.6.18  12:34 pm   Bill, can you please give me a lesson on how to talk to people.

     it's nice if you come up with your own unique way

1.6.18  12:29 pm   What's your opinion on time?

     seems legit

     Is it fake?

     no

      Can we time travel,

     time is actually required for travel

      and does the future affect the past in the same way the past affects the future?

     no

1.6.18  12:09 pm   qhat is ur greatest achievement of all time 

     hopefully something i achieve in the future

1.6.18  10:06 am   How do you feel about disappointing someone?

     bad, not good

1.6.18  10:05 am   is there something you don't ever think of?

     i don't know

1.6.18  10:00 am   Why do you refuse to say how much of the video is done?

     because i get constant harassment about that subject, and giving any kind of answer always leads to more harassment. now that i think about it, not answering leads to harassment also. i guess i am kind of enjoying the harassment, i suppose

1.6.18  9:54 am   What day is it

     "today"

1.6.18  7:43 am   Who's your fav seinfeld side character? I like Mr. Peterman. 

     larry david (he is usually on the side of the stage, off the camera, freaking the heck out over whether or not everything is good enough)

1.6.18  6:35 am   what's the point in beaming notes?

     if you think your life would be better without beaming notes, be my guest. write everything without beams. but don't come crying to me if you decide u need the beams

1.6.18  5:08 am   Do people still "put things on wax?"

     maybe for old times sake

1.6.18  2:43 am   If the universe is expanding, then it would have to be finite, right?

     i don't think so. could be a loose definition of 'expanding' ..... infinity might make a lot of definitions go a bit haywire

1.6.18  2:20 am   cats are weird

     that may be true

1.6.18  2:11 am   Do you like fractals?

     yes

1.6.18  1:03 am   1.4.18  11:55 am Why do you say that rather than I don't know?

     i have said 'i don't know' to that question many times before. that question is asked often enough that it gives me a chance to experiment with different answers

1.6.18  12:24 am   how many miles are in a year?

     it depends how fast you are going

1.5.18  11:52 pm   bill i understand your ostensible dislike of pink floyd

     what the heck are you talking about

     but perhaps you can share to the class a song of theirs that you dislike the least, or one that stands out to you as halfway decent?

     i haven't heard that much pink floyd, but i absolutely do not dislike them, not by any stretch of the imagination, and i am disappointed that someone is spreading rumours to that effect

1.5.18  11:48 pm   is it socially acceptable to play the piano with a pick?

     i'm not sure, i've never tried it, socially

1.5.18  11:46 pm   what's a good conversation starter?

     so do u wanna have a conversation

1.5.18  11:17 pm   How do you feel about politics?

     fine

1.5.18  10:30 pm   what is this second chord? It seems like a Fsus4 but i cant seem to figure the voicing out

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bH3ZvmQxqak

      that would be known as Eb over F, or you could call it F9sus4(no 5) if you prefer

1.5.18  9:26 pm   Have u ever slipped on a banana peel?

     no

1.5.18  9:12 pm   have you ever looked back and wondered, "wow, how the hell did I get here?"

     yes

     If so, what was it like?

     it was a lot like how you described it

1.5.18  8:51 pm   Why did George McGovern lose the election to Nixon? I don't know anything about his policies and stuff... But, I mean, come on... his last name was fucking 'McGovern'. Probably pretty good at governing.

     yes but nixon was not a crook. mcgovern may have also not been a crook, but nixon was for sure not a crook

1.5.18  8:38 pm   Do I make the lyrics first or the notes first when making a song? I haven't really done it before. Asking for a friend :^)

     i only do it both at the same time. i can't imagine doing it any other way, but to each their own

1.5.18  8:06 pm   how do I tell someone I have a crush on them 

     i don't know of any possible way that works. probably just don't

1.5.18  7:30 pm   Are u sure that life is possible?

     yes

1.5.18  6:47 pm   What do you think about God??

     it sounds to me like a name for something that is impossible to name

1.5.18  6:47 pm   do you know who killed jfk 

     no

1.5.18  6:06 pm   i have no motivation to create any more. can u help me?

     hopefully you can find a situation where you don't have to create

1.5.18  5:08 pm   Is zero a number? 

     sure

1.5.18  4:10 pm   how do you know when a project is "done"

     you just have to guess

1.5.18  3:46 pm   Is foog a word? 

     it might be

1.5.18  1:58 pm   i think more and more people are creating their own spiritual beliefs and practices, independent of religions and "isms". but i don't know if that's actually true or wishful thinking.

     i think if you don't subscribe to one of the official religions, you have to pay a fee, and are also considered a criminal. but that's ok, i guess

1.5.18  1:56 pm   For a riff, do you record it once then loop it, or do you play for the rest of the song?

     i try to avoid copy/pasting anything in a song. even if it seems exactly the same, if you actually do it separately, each time will feel exactly the way it's supposed to feel for where it is at that point in the song

1.5.18  12:29 pm   judging from what i've seen on your instagram, your next video will be about the mall. am i accurate

     only the second verse

1.5.18  9:17 am   does buying merch help financially support you?

     sure but you can also do it here in case you don't want a damn t-shirt

1.5.18  8:32 am   Do you have any other interests besides music and videos? What do you like to do for fun?

     anagrams, tweets, and various other things related to the bill wurtz brand, and billwurtz dot com

1.5.18  7:29 am   what is the best

     everything is better than every other thing

1.5.18  6:36 am   do you like being awake in the daytime or night time more?

     no

1.5.18  12:55 am   What do you think about your videos?

     it's a chance for me to really see what can be done

1.5.18  12:15 am   do you believe that all horses are part of the Illuminati

      no

1.5.18  12:13 am   what is your word for philosopher?

     person

1.5.18  12:05 am   i'm tired what should i do 

     sleep?

1.4.18  11:58 pm   what is your opinion of flamingos?

     i am working with my therapist to learn to understand them
